channel.description: Recent content in kenobi on Classroom

item.title: TryHackME Room Kenobi
item.description: kenobi Task 01 : Deploy the vulnerable machine Flag-ID question 1 Make sure you’re connected to our network and deploy the machine 2 Scan the machine with nmap, how many ports are open? Task 02: Enumerating Samba for shares cheat sheet nmap -p 445 --script=smb-enum-shares.nse,smb-enum-users.nse [IP] smbclient //<ip>/anonymous smbget -R smb://<ip>/anonymous #recursive download files nmap -p 111 --script=nfs-ls,nfs-statfs,nfs-showmount 10.10.233.45 #show mounts Flag-ID question 1 Using the nmap command above, how many shares have been found?
